varz.spec module¶

varz.spec.sequential(prefix=None)[source]¶

Decorator that generates variable names for unnamed variables sequentially.

Parameters

prefix (str, optional) – Prefix to prepend to the name of generated variables. Defaults to no prefix.

class varz.spec.Unbounded(*args, **kw_args)[source]¶

Bases: varz.spec.VariableType

Type of an unbounded variable.

instantiate(vs, name, init)[source]¶

Instantiate the variable.

Parameters

  • vs (vars.Vars) – Variable container to extract the variable from.

  • name (str) – Name of the variable.

  • init (object) – Initial value.

Bases: varz.spec.VariableType

Type of a positive variable.

Instantiate the variable.

Parameters

  • vs (vars.Vars) – Variable container to extract the variable from.

  • init (object) – Initial value.

Type of a bounded variable.

varz.spec.parametrised(prefix=None)[source]¶

Decorator to specify variables with types.

Parameters

prefix (str, optional) – Prefix to prepend to the name of generated variables. Defaults to no prefix.
